{"id":836585955,"question_id":345,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1667544634,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/836585955/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        vector<char>vowels;\n        int a[1000] = {};\n        a['a'] = a['e'] = a['i'] = a['o'] = a['u'] = 1;\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){\n            if(a[tolower(s[i])] == 1)vowels.push_back(s[i]);\n        }\n        reverse(vowels.begin(), vowels.end());\n        int location = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){\n            if(a[tolower(s[i])] == 1)s[i] = vowels[location++];\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
